geoRegion: Biberach an der Riß, Baden-Württemberg, Germany

currentPositions.description:
Individual scientific promotion in acknowledgment of scientific and strategic contributions in R&D.

Accounts for drug product analytics and analytical strategies, supporting a broad range of products and modalities (classical antibodies, multispecifics, fusion proteins, homologues, new formats, therapeutic peptides, ADCs, as well as cell and gene therapy products).
Leads a team of highly skilled technicians and analytical scientists.
Assures state of the art analytical concepts and technologies.

Establishes and leads collaborations and innovation projects (both internal and external). Contribution to global innovation strategy and steering of innovation project portfolio.

Active member and company representant in several external panels and working groups (see also under organizations), including leadership roles. Invited peer reviewer for scientific journals (e.g. J Pharm Sci).

Accounts for cGMP and regulatory compliance within drug product analytics, represents own area of responsibility in audits and health authority inspections (e.g. PAI), as well as in health authority interactions (e.g. scientific advice meetings)
Takes responsibility for QC batch release and stability testing, product characterization and explorative studies, as well as troubleshooting activities.
Contributed to numerous IND applications, at clinical trial level (CTA) as well as several final market authorization (BLA/MAA) and respective regulatory communication.

Established drug product analytical lab, including staff recruitment and team assembly, planning of lab facility and technical setting, qualification of analytical equipment.

Represents analytical development in biologics R&D project teams as team member analytics.
currentPositions.title: Senior Principal Scientist

headline: Biotherapeutics Professional | Senior Principal Scientist

organizations.name: IQ Consortium -  International Consortium for Quality & Innovation in Pharmaceutical Development
EFPIA - European Federation of Pharmaceutical Industries and Associations

location: Biberach an der Riß, Baden-Württemberg, Germany

message.text: Take the chance to join a great team and make your first step into the world of industrial drug development!

#stellefrei! WE are hiring!

We are looking for a highly motivated PostDoc in Our Primary Packaging Development Team. You will Drive the Development of Container closure systems in Boehringer's Portfolio. Bring your Expertise, Ambition, and passion for Innovation to a globally recognized, Family-owned company and Join Our Team.
Great opportunity in an awesome team - do not hesitate to apply!

We continue to grow our team in CNS and Retinal Health.

As a Pharmacometrician (all levels) you will represent Pharmacometrics in project teams, identify opportunities to apply model-informed drug development, develop strategies to support decision making and put them into action.
We believe that every member of the PMx group should be empowered to shape the future of PMx at Boehringer Ingelheim by actively contributing or leading internal and external working groups focusing on e.g. PBPK, disease strategies, innovative methods, IT, standardization and processes.
If you share our values of pro-actively contributing to discussions, a culture of sharing knowledge, actively seeking feedback and believe in a positive "how to" attitude in challenging situations then have a look at our positions:

https://lnkd.in/eHmfw-Hn
https://lnkd.in/ebKqV-FC
https://lnkd.in/eghjJk-T

Congrats to all awardees and in general to all the colleagues on IQ investing in collaborative science to advance drug development together!

It is a huge honor for me to be part of that list again

The IQ Consortium proudly announces the 2023 IQ Recognition Award Recipients! Congratulations to all awardees! https://lnkd.in/eQXNJfEH.
#iqconsortium #awards2023 #innovation #collaboration
